samhita: yuq~jjAqnaH pra#thaqmaM mana#staqtvAya# saviqtA dhiya#H | aqgniM jyOti#rniqcAyya# pRuthiqvyA addhyA &Ba#rat || yuqktvAyaq mana#sA dEqvAnth suva#ryaqtO dhiqyA diva$M | bRuqhajjyOti#H kariShyaqtaH sa#viqtA prasu#vAtiq tAn || yuqktEnaq mana#sA vaqyaM dEqvasya# saviqtuH saqvE | suqvaqrgEyA#yaq Saktyai$ || yuq~jjatEq mana# uqta yu#~jjatEq dhiyOq viprAq vipra#sya bRuhaqtO vi#paqScita#H | vi hOtrA# dadhE vayunAq vidEkaq in - [  ] 1
